notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: SSB contributed to conception and design of the study; data collection; data analysis and interpretation; and drafting of the manuscript. ARF helped with design of the study; data collection; and drafting of the manuscript. NBS contributed to conception and design of the study; data collection; drafting of the manuscript; and substantive revisions to the manuscript. CD helped with data collection; drafting of the manuscript; and substantive revisions to the manuscript. RC contributed to substantive revisions to the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
